last_episode_to_air.name: Twist
last_episode_to_air.overview: Kumar has been promoted due to Kanjaria's death. He keeps on reading one page of the diary every day before sleeping and things begin to go well for him until one day he finds out that a woman is about to enter his life.

name: Samantar
overview: What if two individuals share the same destiny- the same palm lines, then what would happen? Samantar is a story about a young man Kumar Mahajan, whose life changes after he goes on journey to find, Sudarshan Chakrapani, a man who shares the same destiny with him. The life that Kumar is living is the life that Chakrapani has already lived. Will Kumar be able to control his present or change his future after meeting Chakrapani?
